# Note on this fork
I have written a parallelised implementation of clumpp and included it in the clumpak function. It can be activated using the argument `parallel = TRUE`. 

This depends on the `future.apply` package. 

You need `devtools` for installation.

## Install this fork:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
#install.packages(c("devtools","future.apply"))
devtools::install_github("SethMusker/starmie")
```
